Returns: True if the listener has consumed the event, false otherwise.
Parameters: View: The view the hover event has been dispatched to.
MotionEvent: The MotionEvent object containing full information about the event.
onHover(android.view.View,android.view.M.Description: Called when a hover event is dispatched to a view. This allows listeners to get a chance to respond before the target view.
onHover(android.view.View,android.view.M.FullName: public abstract boolean onHover (View v, MotionEvent event)

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a hover event is dispatched to this view. The callback will be invoked before the hover event is given to the view.
